# Metamagic, Extend, Lesser
## Overview
**Aura** strong (no school); **CL** 17th

**Slot** none

**Price** 3,000 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

The wielder can cast up to three spells (from 1st to 3rd level) per day that are extended as though using the [[Extend Spell (Feat)|Extend Spell]] feat.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Rod (Feat)|Craft Rod]], [[Extend Spell (Feat)|Extend Spell]]

**Cost** 1,500 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 485
